body.name: Joorniao Retro Handheld Game Console with 500 Classical Games, Portable Retro Video Game Console with 3.0-Inch Screen, 1020mAh Rechargeable Battery Support TV Output & 2 Players Gift for Boys(OR)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 37 mins
features: 【500 Classic games】Built-in 500 classic games, this mini retro console includes sports, adventure and puzzle games, as well as intelligence and educational games related to memory, math and logic. No card to download, no extra cost. It's got all the classic retro games you could ever want to play.

【2 Players & Play on TV】Package includes game console, USB cable and AV output cable. Connect the controller to a small handheld game console to play two-player games. You can also connect the 3.0-inch LCD screen to your TV via the AV output to get the double pleasure of a larger screen.

【Compact and Light】The 150g game console weighs less than a bottle of drinking water and takes up no space, making it easy to put in your pocket when traveling. Play with it wherever you go. Take it with you when you go out.

【1020mAh Rechargeable Battery】Built-in 1020mAh large capacity lithium battery, each full charge can play for up to 5 hours. Cycle charge, convenient and safe. Don't worry about running out of power when you're on a business trip, traveling, or camping. (Tip: Fully charge the battery before first use)

【Magical Gift for Children and Adults】This children's handheld game console is the ideal gift for children and adults on birthdays or any occasion. The value of this gift will increase over time. Savor your childhood memory together! If you have any questions during the use, please feel free to contact us. Buy it now to get: (1) Game Console; (2) USB Cable; (3) AV Output Cable; (4) User Manual.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3.0 Inch Retro FC Video Games Handheld Game Console 500 games in one portable game console! The ultimate multimedia excitement for everything you love! 100% premium quality. With 500 built-in games, you can play whenever and wherever you want.

Classic 80s 90s Retro Games ——Retro Handheld Game Console Whichever and whatever you like, there must be a game for you. Just have a try, and experience the dissimilar enjoyment which this Retro Handheld Game Console brings for you! A great way to diffuse stress on life and work. Bring you happy and give you a wonderful childhood memories.
Package includes: 1 x Game Console1 x Gamepad1 x Built-in battery1 x USB Cable1 x AV Output Cable1 x User Manual
Spice up all your boredom at once and spend your free time having fun with our handheld game console.

Perfect Gift for Children The Retro FC Video Games Handheld Game Console is light and portable, perfect for carrying on long trips. The Handheld Game Console works for four to six hours. It's mini and easy to store. From this, you can easily spice up the boredom of a long trip and immerse yourself in a fun handheld console game for children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great portable game
reviews.reviewText: This portable game is packed with different types of games that will keep your kids entertained

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Handheld device works great, however the plug in controller does not work, so I am unable to hook it up and play it on the tv.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids
reviews.reviewText: Ordered one for both my 11 and 9 year Olds. Retro games just like I played 20 years ago. Very impressed and they hold long battery life and abuse by children!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Display hurts to look at
reviews.reviewText: Display hurts to look at for more than a few minutes, the color saturation makes everything feel out of focus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cool with some flaws
reviews.reviewText: I love that it had so many games I grew up loving - but some of the games will not work. You're unable to save games and it's very easy to accidentally leave game. And having to fish through 501 games to find one is a pain. But it is fun novelty gift to have

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don’t have super high expectations
reviews.reviewText: Well, it’s kinda what it says it is. I wanted something to travel with for cars and planes, and it does the trick.ButzzzA lot of the games are repeats or weird knockoff versions of games. The buttons are a bit rough and hurt my fingers a bit, so I can’t use this for as long at a time as I had planned.You can’t save progress so I don’t get much progress through the game and end up having to restart it and then get bored of playing the same parts over and over.So. It’ll do for a kid and doesn’t cost a ton of money, but I didn’t get as much of a nostalgia fix as I hoped with this one.
